data.description: Implement context analyzer that detects: current files/modules being worked on, active sprint/epic, branch state. Use this to select relevant contextual layers.

properties.retrospective: Context detection for layer inclusion was already fully implemented in cortical/got/claudemd.py with ContextAnalyzer, LayerSelector, ClaudeMdComposer, ClaudeMdValidator, and ClaudeMdGenerator. Improved test coverage from 85% to 98% by adding 16 new tests covering: exception paths, edge cases, content handling, MAX_LINES validation, fallback paths, and delegation methods.
